Dear candidate,

Application for the Post of Administrative Officer (AO)

With reference to your application for the post of AO, I am pleased to invite you to attend a preliminary selection interview. Details of the interview are as follows –

Date: XXX

Time: XXX

Venue: XXX


Preparation for the Interviews

Please arrive at least 20 minutes before the interview and bring with you –

(a) this email;

(b) your Hong Kong Identity Card;

(c) THE ORIGINAL AND ONE COPY of your “Basic Law Test (Degree / Professional Grades) Result Notification”, if any; and

(d) ALL ORIGINAL certificates showing your academic qualifications, such as XXX.


Use of Digital Devices During the Interviews Prohibited

Please kindly note that during the interview session, you will NOT be allowed to make use of any digital devices, including but not limited to mobile phones, pagers, notebook computers, bluetooth headsets, cameras, sound recorders, or any devices which are of communication or audio/video recording capabilities.

How to Reply

Please confirm your attendance at the interview by filling in and signing the enclosed Reply Form. Please return the completed form to us by email (address: XXX) or by fax (Fax No.:XXX) by XXX.

Please note that invitation to interviews does NOT imply that we have already completed assessing/verifying your qualifications to have met the entry requirements for the post.

Enquiries

Should you have any question, please contact XXX on XXX.


Yours sincerely,


(XXX)
for Secretary for the Civil Service
